PrecisRules Amending the COMPETITION TRIBUNAL RULES by harmonizing them with the amendments contained in Bill C-20 (An Act to amend the Competition Act and to make consequential and related amendments to other Acts) and by introducing new rules respecting Decisions and Orders concerning deceptive marketing practices.
